resources.string:
Socials Addict 
The Smartest,Fastest and most accurate social networks monitoring app.. 

this app is open source project made by Pi Developers Team and signed under GNU public license, you may use the source code of this app for your own use or re-distrubute it but with mentioning the original source 

CHANGELOG: 
V6.5: 
UX improvements 
Full lollipop support (5.0.x , 5.1.x) 
Bug fixes 
Code improvement 

 
V6.5.1: 
Added "00:00:00" time format 
Added richer notification 
Added 
Added welcome screen 
Bug fix for lollipop 
Basic Android Marshmallow support 

 
V6.5.1.1: 
Bugfixes 

 
V6.5.1.2: 
Bugfixes 

 
V6.5.1.3: 
Bugfixes 

 
V6.5.1.4: 
Bugfixes

Pi Developers 
Creativity is our middle name. 

 A tech startup -to be- 
 we are Egyptians, a group of teenagers with vision and mind. we want to make computer (PC, mobile..etc) users usage better and easier by offering new solutions. 

- What is our goal ? 
We were born to innovate, not to copy others. We follow this slogan as it is the bible, since our launch we have been creating ideas, or refining others, we will not settle for normal when we can reach for the stars. 

- Our philosophy ? 
To reach the greatest potential with your device and make you -the user- satisfied.by using our solutions, your life will be better.User comes first, all this work is for you, and every person is potentially a user, so you all matter to us.We work for you. 

- Why to use our apps ? 
By using our apps, if not for their awesomeness , you are supporting youth to create and show their minds, everyone deserves to think, and that is how we think. 

- I love your work, How can I support you? 
You can support us by simply by sharing our work and downloading it, you can donate soon too. 

- Why do you think you are different ? 
We love what we do, simple.
